name: Myst V: End of Ages
descr:
The Grand Finale of the greatest adventure!  Decide the fate of a civilization in this triumphant final chapter to the Myst saga.  Embark on an epic journey into the heart of a shattered empire as the only explorer who can still save it— or destroy it with the wrong choices.
Whether you’re a longtime Myst fan or new to the series, the Grand Finale is an epic adventure you won’t want to miss.[h2]Key features:[/h2][list][li]Developed by the original creators of Myst:  Rand Miller and Cyan Worlds bring you the ultimate chapter in a series already renowned as the pinnacle of adventure gaming.
[/li][li]Explore vast 3D worlds with an easy click of the mouse:  Improved point-and-click interface offers several options to accommodate your exploration style.
[/li][li]Interact with the world like never before:  The innovative new slate lets you communicate with mysterious creatures and manipulate the world around you.
[/li][li]The characters of Myst brought to life:  New facial mapping technology brings characters to life with unprecedented emotion and expressiveness.[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Myst V: End of Ages
类型: 冒险, 休闲
开发商: Cyan Worlds Inc
发行商: Cyan Worlds Inc
系列: Myst
发行日期: 2005 年 7 月 19 日
review: 全部评测: 褒贬不一 (208) - 此游戏的 208 篇用户评测中有 64% 为好评。
全部评测: 褒贬不一 (208 篇中的 64%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.8 GHz
Memory: 512 MB RAM (1 GB recommended)
Hard Disk Space: 5 GB available
Video Card: 32 MB DirectX® 9.0c compliant video card supporting 32-bit color
DirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c or greater
Sound: DirectX® 9.0c compliant
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
OS: macOS up to 10.14 Mojave supported. Catalina and Big Sur currently unsupported.
Processor: 1.8 GHz
Memory: 512MB RAM
Graphics: 3D graphics card with 64MB VRAM
Storage: 4.8GB HDD
*
2024 年 2 月 15 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将不再支持 32 位游戏及 macOS 10.14 或更低版本。
